name: SurViking: Undead
description:
- Lore -

In the beginning there was once a Viking Ruler who conquered his homelands through blood and the strength of his mighty warriors. In pursuit of greater power, he lost everything and was cursed to roam the earth as an undead. Furious, he wanders the lands seeking vengeance by slaughtering everything that blocks his path to find the wicked being who condemned him to this fate.

 

- Game Description -

In my game the player takes control of a Viking named ‘Ulf-Axehand’ in an endless runner that implements survival mechanics for a unique experience that truly challenges the player. As the player, you will need to decide between avoiding or attacking any foe that crosses your path. As with these mechanics, a simple choice can prove to be a fatal mistake that costs your life.

- Key Features -

  • Survival Mechanics:
  • Melee Attack – Does high amounts of damage
  • Ranged Attack – Hitting enemies will steal Health and Heal the player
  • Rage Mode – entering rage mode makes the player invulnerable to damage
  • Range of Different Enemies – soldiers/wildlife/creatures/monsters
  • Day/Night Cycle

The player will need to be constantly aware of how much hunger they may have as running out will result in the player starving and restrictions to player control. The player also heals when a certain amount of hunger is maintained. The player is also given a unique resource at their disposal called the rage bar, that utilizes the blood harnessed from attacking enemies to manifest axes and enter rage mode.
